Major_Arcs.title: King Guz's Predicament
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the story with King Guz in a humorous predicament and sets up the character of Alley.

sub_scenes.title: King Guz's Debt
sub_scenes.description: King Guz is rescued by Alley, who immediately demands repayment of an old debt, leading to a comical confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: King Guz's Wet Predicament and Unpaid Debt

Major_Arcs.title: Dinosaur Dealership
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Alley's decision to trade in his old dinosaur, Dinny, leading him to Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership and the eventual purchase of a new, smaller dinosaur.

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Trade-In Consideration
sub_scenes.description: Alley decides to trade in his clumsy dinosaur, Dinny, after discussing its age with another character.

sub_scenes.title: Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership Visit
sub_scenes.description: Alley and another character visit Honest Zog's dealership and explore various dinosaur options.

sub_scenes.title: Compact Dinosaur Test Drive and Purchase
sub_scenes.description: Alley test drives a smaller dinosaur, which bites the unnamed character's hat, leading to a deal confirmation.

narrative_arcs.title: Deal Sealed and Zog's Dino's Bite

sub_scenes.title: Farewell to Dinny
sub_scenes.description: Alley bids an emotional farewell to his old dinosaur, Dinny.

narrative_arcs.title: Alley's Farewell and Mixed Feelings about Dinny
Departure with New Dino & Zog's Advice

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Unruly Test Ride and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Dinny is evaluated by potential buyers, has a chaotic test ride, and is eventually rescued by Alley after revealing his past mistreatment.

narrative_arcs.title: Unexpectedly Wild Test Ride on Dinny

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Misunderstandings
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores romantic misunderstandings and conflicts, focusing on Alley and Coola's relationship and broader themes of male-female interactions.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Invitation and Argument with Coola
sub_scenes.description: Alley invites Coola fishing, leading to an argument about being taken for granted and an abrupt, violent end to their conversation.

sub_scenes.title: Misogynistic Fishing Commentary
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen express misogynistic views while fishing, leading to arguments about noise and fishing etiquette.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusations and Apology by the Riverbank

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Rivalry and Accusation
sub_scenes.description: A romantic rivalry is introduced, with accusations of competition for Oola's affections.

sub_scenes.title: Jealousy and Misdirected Violence
sub_scenes.description: Jealousy leads to violence, but the anger is misdirected, and the true romantic pairing is revealed.

Major_Arcs.title: The Twitch Dance Craze
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc revolves around a new dance craze called 'The Twitch,' exploring its social impact, physical consequences, and Alley's involvement.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Advice and Sabotage
sub_scenes.description: Romantic advice is given, and a jealous rival attempts sabotage, which backfires.

sub_scenes.title: Infidelity and Reactions
sub_scenes.description: Various reactions to infidelity are shown, and Oola seeks forgiveness after learning from 'a Frenchman'.

narrative_arcs.title: Romantic Interlude and Loss of Control
Clarification of Affection and Misunderstood Kiss

sub_scenes.title: Polite Courtship and Male Complaint
sub_scenes.description: A polite romantic approach is contrasted with male camaraderie and complaints about women.

narrative_arcs.title: Male Camaraderie and Complaint about Women

sub_scenes.title: Consequences of the Twitch and Social Pressure
sub_scenes.description: The negative physical and social consequences of 'The Twitch' are explored, including injuries and social pressure to participate.

narrative_arcs.title: The Unfortunate Consequences of the New Twist
Encouragement and Dismissal of the New Twist
Social Pressure to Participate in the Twitch Party

sub_scenes.title: Dance Lessons and Humiliation
sub_scenes.description: Alley seeks dance lessons for 'The Twitch', resulting in a painful and ultimately humiliating experience.

narrative_arcs.title: Post-Twitch Inquiry and Admission of Failure
Fleeing in Fear and Public Humiliation
Hospital Quiet and Watching the Aftermath

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel to Spain for Research
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc involves time travel to ancient Spain for historical research, leading to unexpected romantic encounters and comedic mishaps.

sub_scenes.title: Scholarly Inquiry and Time Travel Setup
sub_scenes.description: Scholars discuss 16th-century Spain and decide to use time travel to get firsthand information.

narrative_arcs.title: Scholarly Inquiry and Time Travel Suggestion

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Scene in Ancient Spain and Time Travel Mishap
sub_scenes.description: Time travel to Spain results in a romantic encounter and a mishap that brings cave dwellers to the present.

narrative_arcs.title: Time Traveler's Successful Tuning and Observation
Romantic Kiss Interruption and Time Travel Activation
Time Travel and Accidental Kiss in the Present

sub_scenes.title: Lab Confusion and Spain Assignment Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Confusion in the lab is followed by clarification of the Spain assignment and the successful return of someone to the past.

narrative_arcs.title: Confused in the Present Time Lab
Reassurance and Impending Return to Spain

Major_Arcs.title: Caveman in a Strange Land Bullfight
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows a caveman in a foreign land, leading to misunderstandings and his unexpected participation in a bullfight.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival and Street Serenade Intervention
sub_scenes.description: A caveman arrives in a strange land and intervenes in a street serenade, misunderstanding the situation.

narrative_arcs.title: The Famous Don and the Disturbance

sub_scenes.title: Bullfight and Victory
sub_scenes.description: The caveman becomes involved in a bullfight, showcasing his unconventional fighting style and achieving a surprising victory.

narrative_arcs.title: Setting the Stage for an Unconventional Bullfight

Major_Arcs.title: Return and Romantic Denial
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on OOP's return from time travel and the comedic denial of a promised kiss due to jealousy.

sub_scenes.title: Planning and Chaotic Return of OOP
sub_scenes.description: Plans to retrieve OOP are made, and his return is chaotic, leading to a promised kiss being denied.

Major_Arcs.title: King for a Day Ironic Twist
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the ironic reality of being 'King for a Day,' where the temporary king faces immediate rejection and the original king's true intentions are revealed.

sub_scenes.title: King for a Day and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: A 'King for a Day' is appointed but immediately rejected by the villagers, revealing an ironic twist orchestrated by the original king.

narrative_arcs.title: Debate on the King's Easy Life

sub_scenes.title: Temporary King Guz's Domestic Troubles
sub_scenes.description: Guz temporarily takes King Guz's place and faces domestic troubles with Oompa.

narrative_arcs.title: Guz's Lazy Indulgence and Bon-Bon Mishap
Broom Attack and Temporary King Plea

Major_Arcs.title: Clam Dispute and Wise Counsel
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents a simple dispute over clams and the attempt to resolve it through wise counsel, which ultimately becomes moot.

sub_scenes.title: Clam Dispute and Loss
sub_scenes.description: Characters argue over clams, attempt to seek wise counsel, only to find the clams have disappeared.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusations of Cheating and Fighting Over Money
Seeking Wise Counsel and Loss of Clams

Major_Arcs.title: Kingly Life and Ulcerous Dinner
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc portrays aspects of royal life, from investigations to lavish dinners, humorously contrasted with the King's health issues and advisor's corruption.

sub_scenes.title: Kingly Duties and Dinner
sub_scenes.description: The King deals with disturbances, enjoys a lavish dinner, but is reminded of his ulcer.

narrative_arcs.title: Investigating the Racket and the Wise Guy's Beating
Fine Advisor's Meal and Self-Serving Thoughts

Major_Arcs.title: Royal Apology and Measuring Ruler
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc contrasts a royal apology with a humorous twist on royalty being used for practical, non-royal tasks.

sub_scenes.title: Royal Apology and Liberation
sub_scenes.description: A royal apology is given, followed by a character's liberation from royal duties.

sub_scenes.title: Ruler Proposition and Practical Use
sub_scenes.description: A ruler proposition turns out to be a humorous misunderstanding, as 'Alley-How' is needed for measuring, not ruling.

Major_Arcs.title: Barberous Act and Time Machine Mishap
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features a barber's forceful customer acquisition and a time machine experiment with humorous and unexpected results.

sub_scenes.title: Barberous Customer Acquisition
sub_scenes.description: A prophecy leads to a barber forcefully bringing in customers in a humorous 'barberous act'.

narrative_arcs.title: The Barberous Act and the Bearded Stranger

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Experiment Gone Roman
sub_scenes.description: A time machine experiment goes awry, bringing a Roman soldier to the present, leading to surprise and a quick fix.

narrative_arcs.title: Time Machine Experiment and Unexpected Visitor
